column2: an A.M. Eatery////Went here on a Friday
column3: and luckily avoided the wait by being willing to eat outside (it was about 60 degrees
column4: so it was a pleasant day). We were impressed by everything we ordered. I got vegetarian eggs Benedict (have never found a vegetarian version of this! So I'm excited to order it!) and a chocolate pancake
column5: which was heavenly. I also appreciated that they let you drink some coffee for free while you wait for a table
column6: which would definitely make the wait easier. Nearly everyone there was a millennial
